bugfixes.1: Fixed root window to stay behind toplevels

features.1: Updated reader connection to display when connection is successful
features.2: Updated install-script to prevent port suspension on USB ports

bugfixes.1: Fixed SIB reconnection when using hub ports.

features.1: Removed R&D functionality from production app.
features.2: Updated reader threads to start/stop individually.
features.3: Updated readers to upload their own analyzed files for the production dashboard.
features.4: Updated experiment ID to lot ID
features.5: Added tagging by incubator ID, which can be updated by the guided setup form for now.

other.2: Removed all functionality related to manual issue reporting.

other.4: Removed all functionality related to summary plotting.

other.6: Removed most advanced settings from the menubar.
other.7: Removed all functionality related to end of experiment view.
other.8: Removed version.json in place with a type checking python class.
other.9: Added 'smart' display toggle to only update display of readers who have reached equilibration time.
other.10: Moved guided setup form to center on the readers frame.
